channel.title: ErasedPkz Skills
channel.description:
I'm currently try to edit the ErasedPkz 317PI loading 525 and im having a bit of issues with the skilling part. WILL POST ALL .JAVA'S WHEN ASKED SO IF YOU KNOW THE PROBLEM, PLEASE.. HELP!
Fishing: When i try to fish, all the fishing spots just turn towards me. It doesnt do any emote to act like its fishing nor does it actually catch any fish.
Fletching: I got it to where i can use the knife on the log, and make the interfaces come up without the client crashing, but now after i actually make the bow the bow interface option doesnt close...
Smithing: Fixed: Making ores. BUT NOW THE MAKE BAR INTERFACE IS NOT CLOSING?!
Others will be posted as i find things i cannot figure out :s

item.title: ErasedPkz Skills
item.dc:creator: @droidmobile droidmobile@yahoo.com
item.description:
@droidmobile wrote:

Ofcourse

public void closeAllWindows() { if(c.getOutStream() != null && c != null) { c.getOutStream().createFrame(300); c.flushOutStream(); c.isBanking = true; c.isShopping = true; c.getTradeAndDuel().declineTrade(); } }

It’s just fishing i really need help with, if someone is willing to help me fix all my skills to work properly i am willing to give one of these accounts as a payment:
Account level 105:

Level 58 pure


Read full topic

item.title: ErasedPkz Skills
item.dc:creator: @Tutorial Tutorial
item.description:
@Tutorial wrote:

[quote=“droidmobile@yahoo.com, post:6, topic:437408”][quote author=rhys132 link=topic=540116.msg3955556#msg3955556 date=1332715120]
c.getPA().closeAllWindows();

use that on the clickingbuttons, when they click to fletch a bow if you use that it should make the bow/bows and close all windows/interfaces
[/quote]
“c.getPA().closeAllWindows();” freezes my client so i use “c.getPA().removeAllWindows();”[/quote]

Do you have the method for it in your PlayerAssistant class?

Read full topic

use that on the clickingbuttons, when they click to fletch a bow if you use that it should make the bow/bows and close all windows/interfaces :D[/quote]

item.title: ErasedPkz Skills
item.dc:creator: @Skiire Skiire
item.description:
@Skiire wrote:

[quote=“droidmobile@yahoo.com, post:3, topic:437408”]Hereis what i got, its not working…

public void firstClickNpc(int npcType) { c.fishitem = -1; c.clickNpcType = 0; c.npcClickIndex = 0; if (c.fishitem != -1) { if (!c.getItems().playerHasItem(c.fishitem)) { c.sendMessage("You need a " + c.getItems().getItemName(c.fishitem) + " to fish for " + c.getItems().getItemName(c.fishies)); c.fishing = false; return; } if (c.getItems().freeSlots() == 0) { c.sendMessage("Your inventory is full."); c.fishing = false; return; } if (c.playerFishing < c.fishreqt) { c.sendMessage("You need a fishing level of " + c.fishreqt + " to fish here."); c.fishing = false; return; } c.fishtimer = c.getFishing().fishtime(c.fishies, c.fishreqt); }[.code][/quote]

Make a switch statement and do something like this:

switch(npc) {
case fishing_spot1:
case fishing_spot2:
case fishing_spot3:
c.getFishing().fishingMethodName();
break;

Ignore conventions, I wrote this in the reply box.

Read full topic

When i try to fish, all the fishing spots just turn towards me. It doesnt do any emote to act like its fishing nor does it actually catch any fish.

Fletching:
I got it to where i can use the knife on the log, and make the interfaces come up without the client crashing, but now after i actually make the bow the bow interface option doesnt close…

Smithing:
Fixed: Making ores.
BUT NOW THE MAKE BAR INTERFACE IS NOT CLOSING?!

Others will be posted as i find things i cannot figure out :s[/quote]

FirstClickNpc for fishing. Call the fishing method you have set-up underneath the fishing spot cases.

c.getPA().closeAllWindows();
